## QueryCookiePagingInitializerComponent class

Component used for rendering query cookie paging initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QueryCookiePagingInitializerComponent extends QueryPagingInitializerComponent implements QueryCookiePagingInitializer, GridPluginGeneric<QueryCookiePagingInitializerOptions> 
```
